Text.text: With this, the first public release of the HANA Predictive Console, Forefront Analytics brings predictive forecasting to your finger tips. This Beta release focuses on intuitive and easy time series forecasting, visualisation, and simple modifications of forecast results, right in the visualisation.
- Social authentication/log in, to simplify application access
- Simple payment options for paid plans
- HANA, Google Sheets, AWS Redshift, Import.IO data sources - CSV and Hadoop to come
- Interactive charting library, for smooth, fast visualisations
- Forecast folder organisation and forecast search
